About Me

Let me tell you few things...

Bio

Ever since I was a young boy, I've had a passion for computers and technologies. I knew this is what I wanted to do with my life! I traded my dreams for a degree in Computer & Communication Engineering. I love the combination of hardware complexity and programming creativity. And I love how there's always more to learn!

Automotive Holdings Group (AHG)

Sales Conslutant

Sept 2019 - Oct 2021

Developed buyers by maintaining rapport with previous customers; suggesting trade-ins. Provided sales management information by completing reports. Closed sales by overcoming objections; asking for sales; negotiating price; completing sales and work with our marketing team to grow our customer base Suggesting suitable vehicles based on customer needs

_Nology

Trainee Software Developer

Nov 2021 - Present

Currently, I'm part of 12 week intensive software engineering course taught by _nology, involving the development of a prototype web application for an external client using cutting edge technologies such as React.js, Microservices, Google Cloud Platform and more, as well as working on real-life client projects and personal projects to gain proficiency in clean coding principles and conflict management in Git. Trained in agile management practices.
